bug.author: MarvinMiao
bug.description: Describe the bug When installing pandas-profiling using pip install, under python2.7.5 enviromnet, I encountered TypeError: Traceback (most recent call last): File "setup.py", line 18, in "\n", TypeError: must be unicode, not str To Reproduce CentOS version: 3.10.0-514.el7.x86_64 python version: 2.7.5 Install method: pip install pandas-profiling

comments.comment: We do not support Python 2. For more information, please read: <denchmark-link:https://python3statement.org/>https://python3statement.org/</denchmark-link> .
